MSG_T FramerReceive (FRAMER *pFr)

Detailed Description

Functions implementing the protocol: reading data

Function Documentation

MSG_T FramerReceive (  FRAMER *  pFr  ) 
 

Function that reads the received characters from the circular buffer using a state machine. The databytes are read from the circular buffer, a check if performed if it is a flagbyte. If it is, then the correct action is undertaken. If it is a databyte then that databyte is added to the framebuffer. A value is returned that tells us what this function has done with the data (if there was any).

Parameters:
pFr Framer to which the data will be posted.
Returns:
state of the state machine.
